div.p: No. 1361, unit 732, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

The
Corporation of Melbourne
Corporation of Melbourne written
above
GOVERNMENT OF VICTORIA
deleted.

Dr. to the undermentioned persons for
Salaries and
Wages , from the 1st day of
September
to the
30th day of
Septr 1865,
inclusive .

border-top: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-left: 0.0104in solid #000000; border-bottom: none; border-right: 0.0104in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.0555in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.0555in;
cell.p:
We, the undersigned, do hereby acknowledge to have received from
Dr F. Mueller. the sums opposite to our several Names, being in full of our Salaries and Wages for the periods herein specified .

cell.p:
Total
ten pounds -- s hillings -- pen

p.seg: I certify that the individuals named in the foregoing Account were actually employed in the Situation and during the period specified opposite the name of each respectively

div.p: Signature of the Head of Department— Ferd. MuellerM.D.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; hyphenate: false; text-align: end;

div.p:
Date
2/10/65
The account was mislaid andnot submitted until sent with M to E. FitzGibbon,15 January 1866.
